# Kotlyn
**WARNING: CURRENTLY WINDOWS ONLY!**<br>
The best toolkit to build, run and compile Kotlin appications.


## Installation Guide
It's really easy, don't worry! ğŸ˜˜

1. Make sure python ğŸ is installed
```bash

```
